mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(STORENO) FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0
SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 ORDER BY STORENO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT DISTINCT STORENAME FROM STOREREG WHERE ${column} LIKE #{query} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(STORENO) FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 AND ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT STORENO, STORENAME, STORECONTENT, STORETABLE, STORETEL, STOREADDR1, STOREADDR2, STOREADDR3, STORETIME, STORESNS, STORECATEGORY, STOREMENU, ORIGINFILENAME, SAVEFILENAME, STOREHIT FROM STOREREG WHERE STATUS = 0 WHERE ${column} LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ORDER BY STORENO) A) B

SELECT STORENO, STORENAME, STORECONTENT, STORETABLE, STORETEL, STOREADDR1, STOREADDR2, STOREADDR3, STORETIME, STORESNS, STORECATEGORY, STOREMENU, ORIGINFILENAME, SAVEFILENAME, STOREHIT FROM STOREREG WHERE STORENO = #{storeNo}
